response.overview: «Why do they stay? »  The boss here is crazy. A group of people who have been living here for a long time have no jobs and spend all day teasing female guests... They dislike each other but rely on each other.  I'm thirty years old, and I encountered a relationship crisis in my thirties. He wanted to buy an off-road vehicle to start a tourism business in Tibet, but he was very poor and a face-saving person. Raising money to buy a car has become difficult. Finally borrowed money to buy the car. Unable to bear the financial pressure, Bingbing hoped that the hotel could make changes, but a conflict arose.
response.title: Stones Can Sing
